description:
While Yayoi, emergency reliever taking over for Chisato, is able to subdue the Oobi batters, Fuurin`s counter-offense is also shut down.
The game goes into the final inning with Oobi Middle leading with three runs.
In the all or nothing top of the 7th inning, Fuurin has a real chance with two outs, but first and third loaded!
Top batter Chisato toughs it out until four balls, turning up the pressure on Oobi with two outs and fully loaded bases.
Then, it`s Tao`s turn, who had been shut down too easily in the previous inning.
Source: crunchyroll
